I love watching Silicon Valley and making videos for my YouTube channel.

I love spending time with my kids, especially when we're baking together.

content.text: Morning! I'm doing good! I'm thinking about starting a YouTube channel.
Morning! That's awesome, what are you thinking of making videos about?
I'm thinking about making videos about my life and my business.
That's a great idea! I love watching YouTube videos about people's lives and businesses.
Me too! I think it's so interesting to see how other people live and what they do for a living.
Exactly! It's also really helpful to see how other people run their businesses.
Yeah, I think it could be a really good way to learn new things and grow my business.
I think it's a great idea! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Thanks! I hope so too!
I'm sure you will!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and kids. We love to bake together.
That sounds like so much fun! I love baking too.
It is! We have a lot of fun together.
What are your favorite things to bake?
I love making chocolate chip cookies and brownies.
Oh, those are my favorite too!
Me too! We also like to make apple pie and other fruit pies.
Those sound delicious! I love fruit pies.
Me too! We have a lot of fun baking together.
I bet you do! It sounds like you have a great family.
I do! I'm so lucky.
I'm glad to hear that!
Thanks
